comment:
* Information to be sent to SysUI about a back event.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: TYPE_UNDEFINED
variables.comment: * The target of the back navigation is undefined.

variables.name: TYPE_DIALOG_CLOSE
variables.comment: * Navigating back will close the currently visible dialog

variables.name: TYPE_RETURN_TO_HOME
variables.comment: * Navigating back will bring the user back to the home screen

variables.name: TYPE_CROSS_ACTIVITY
variables.comment: * Navigating back will bring the user to the previous activity in the same Task

variables.name: TYPE_CROSS_TASK
variables.comment: * Navigating back will bring the user to the previous activity in the previous Task

variables.name: TYPE_CALLBACK
variables.comment: * A {@link OnBackInvokedCallback} is available and needs to be called. *

variables.name: KEY_NAVIGATION_FINISHED
variables.comment:
* Key to access the boolean value passed in {#mOnBackNavigationDone} result bundle
     * that represents if back navigation has been triggered.
     * @hide

variables.name: KEY_GESTURE_FINISHED
variables.comment:
* Key to access the boolean value passed in {#mOnBackNavigationDone} result bundle
     * that represents if back gesture has been triggered.
     * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public int getType()
methods.comment:
* Returns the type of back navigation that is about to happen.
     * @hide
     * @see BackTargetType

methods.name: public IOnBackInvokedCallback getOnBackInvokedCallback()
methods.comment:
* Returns the {@link OnBackInvokedCallback} of the top level window or null if * the client didn't register a callback. *

* This is never null when {@link #getType} returns {@link #TYPE_CALLBACK}. * @hide * @see OnBackInvokedCallback * @see OnBackInvokedDispatcher

methods.name: public boolean isPrepareRemoteAnimation()
methods.comment:
* Return true if the core is preparing a back gesture animation.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean isAnimationCallback()
methods.comment:
* Return true if the callback is {@link OnBackAnimationCallback}.
     * @hide

methods.name: public void onBackNavigationFinished(boolean triggerBack)
methods.comment:
* Callback to be called when the back preview is finished in order to notify the server that
     * it can clean up the resources created for the animation.
     * @hide
     * @param triggerBack Boolean indicating if back navigation has been triggered.

methods.name: public void onBackGestureFinished(boolean triggerBack)
methods.comment:
* Callback to be called when the back gesture is finished in order to notify the server that
     * it can ask app to start rendering.
     * @hide
     * @param triggerBack Boolean indicating if back gesture has been triggered.

methods.name: public static String typeToString(@BackTargetType int type)
methods.comment: * Translates the {@link BackNavigationInfo} integer type to its String representation

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public static String typeToString(@BackTargetType int type)
